choices: In this study, you will be performing annotations on instances from PersonaMem. You are given a Q&A pair, its category, as well as the full context of the conversation. As this will be long, feel free to use Ctrl+F. Your task is consider the 4 statements below, and assign a value.
The question is well-formed and makes sense.
The question is relevant to the conversation.
The question falls under the type it's labeled with.
'Correct_Answer' is indeed correct, and can be derived from the context.
'Correct_Answer' is better than all of the 'Incorrect_Answers'.
